meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lean.
meanings.sent1: Her leannesses was evident in her slender figure.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's leannesses helped him run faster.
meanings.sent3: The cat's leannesses made it easy for her to squeeze through the narrow gap.
meanings.sent4: The tree's leannesses in the wind gave it a graceful appearance.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's leannesses on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The act of leaning or inclining.
meanings.sent1: The leannesses of the tower made it look like it might fall.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the leannesses of the tree as it swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The leannesses of the bookshelf caused all the books to slide off.
meanings.sent4: The leannesses of the old building against the new skyscraper was a striking contrast.
meanings.sent5: The leannesses of the tower created a sense of danger in the storm.
